mapper.select: SELECT A.TEST_NUM, A.PASS_AMT, A.NON_PASS_AMT, B.PRCS_DIR_DE_CODE, B.PRCS_CODE, B.INPUT_AMT FROM PROD_QUALITY A JOIN PRCS_ING B ON A.PRCS_ING_CODE = B.PRCS_CODE WHERE B.PRCS_CODE = ( SELECT MAX(PRCS_CODE) FROM PRCS_ING )

SELECT A.TEST_NUM ,A.PRCS_ING_CODE ,B.TEST_NUM_INFO ,B.TEST_CODE ,A.TEST_NUM ,C.TEST_NAME ,C.PASS_VALUE ,B.TEST_RESULT ,B.PASS_YN FROM prod_quality a JOIN prod_quality_info b ON(a.test_num = b.test_num) RIGHT JOIN com_test c ON(b.test_code = c.test_code) WHERE a.test_num =#{testNum}
